name: ROBERTO ZAMORA ESTRADA
sampleDescriptions: Mr Zamora- Estrada is a US Citizen who seeking assistance to protect his Human Rights as his wife tried to kill him by administering arsenic poisoning in his native homeland of Nicaragua.
